EmailTemplate.description: A notification that will be sent when an Enhancement case is ready for review
EmailTemplate.name: Case: 3) Notification of Review Status
EmailTemplate.subject: Case #{{!Case.CaseNumber} is Ready for Review
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
The Salesforce enhancement requested in {!Case.Subject} is now ready for review.
Please take a moment to look over the Case comments on: {!Case.Link} and provide feedback (questions or concerns) in a new Case Comment.
If you approve of the projected changes please indicate so by checking the "Solution Approved" check box in the Case Details section and your changes will go-live in the first avail Change Management Cycle.
Thank you, Your Salesforce Team
